title: BRIEF-Info Edge (India) Enters Agreement To Invest Through Its Unit About 15 Mln Rupees In LQ Global Services Pvt. Ltd.
text:
BRIEF-Info Edge (India) Enters Agreement To Invest Through Its Unit About 15 Mln Rupees In LQ Global Services Pvt. Ltd.

Stock Markets 30 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 15:36)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Info Edge (India) Enters Agreement To Invest Through Its Unit About 15 Mln Rupees In LQ Global Services Pvt. Ltd. Oct 18 (Reuters) - Info Edge (India) Ltd : * INFO EDGE (INDIA) LTD -HAS ENTERED INTO AGREEMENT TO INVEST, THROUGH ITS WHOLLY-OWNED SUBSIDIARY, ABOUT 15 MILLION RUPEES IN LQ GLOBAL SERVICES PVT. LTD.

BRIEF-Info Edge (India) Enters Agreement To Invest Through Its Unit About 15 Mln Rupees In LQ Global Services Pvt. Ltd.
